name: PigLatinTranslator
0:
”Alexa ask Pig Latin Translator how to say "Hello"”
”Alexa ask Pig Latin Translator to translate "What a wonderful day"”
”Alexa ask Pig Latin Translator to get translation for "Pig Latin"”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pig latin translator
des: The Pig Latin Translator will happily translate any word or phrase into Pig Latin. Ask the translator what a word or phrase is in Pig Latin, and it will speak that word or phrase in Pig Latin.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
